maqras.text: Az tu xaʙar mepursand, ki ojo haq ast? Bigu: «Ore, savgand ʙa Parvardigoram, ki haq ast va sumoro quvvai firor az on nest!»

Agar har gunahkore sohiʙi hamai rui zamin ʙosad, xohad, ki xudro ʙa on azoʙ ʙozxarad va cun azoʙro ʙingarand, pusajmonii xud dar dil nihon dorand. Mijonason ʙa adolat hukm savad va mavridi sitam voqe' nagardand
Bidoned, ki har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast, az oni Xudost! Va ogoh ʙosed, ki va'dai Xudo haq ast, vale ʙestarason namedonand
Ust, ki zinda mekunadu memironad va hama ʙa sui U ʙozmegardand
Ej mardum, ʙaroi sumo az coniʙi Parvardigoraton pande omad va sifoe ʙaroi on ʙemorie, ki dar dil dored va rohnamoivu rahmate ʙaroi mu'minon
Bigu: «Ba fazli Xudovu rahmati U». Sodmon savand, zero in du az har ci cam' mekunand, ʙehtar ast
Bigu: «Ojo ʙa rizqe, ki Xudo ʙarojaton nozil kardaast, nigaristaed? Ba'zero harom sumurded va ʙa'zero halol». Bigu: «Xudo ʙa sumo icoza dodaast jo ʙa U duruƣ meʙanded?»
Onon, ki ʙa Xudo duruƣ meʙandand, dar ʙorai ruzi qijomat ci gumon kardaand? Xudo fazli xudro ʙa mardumon arzoni medorad, vale ʙestarinason sukr namegujand

Dar har kore, ki ʙosi va har ci az Qur'on ʙixoni va dast ʙa har amale, ki ʙizaned, hangome ki ʙa on mepardozed, mo nozir ʙar sumo hastem. Bar Parvardigori tu hatto ʙa miqdori zarrae dar zaminu osmonho pusida nest. Va har ci xurdtar az on jo ʙuzurgtar az on ʙosad, dar kitoʙi muʙin navista sudaast
Ogoh ʙosed, ki ʙar dustoni Xudo ʙime nest va ƣamgin namesavand
Kasonero, ki imon ovardand va parhezgori mekardand
xusxaʙar ast onhoro dar dunjovu oxirat. Suxani Xudo digargun namesavad. In ast komjoʙii ʙuzurg
Suxani onon turo ƣamgin nasozad. Izzat ʙa tamomi az oni Xudovand ast. Ust, ki sunavovu donost
Ogoh ʙosed, ki az oni Xudost har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast va onon, ki ƣajri Xudoro sarikon mexonand, az gumoni xud pajravi mekunand va duruƣ megujand
Ust, ki saʙro ʙarojaton padid ovard, to dar on ʙijoromed va ruzro padid ovard, to dar on ʙuʙined. Dar inho ʙaroi mardume, ki mesunavand, iʙrathost
Guftand: «Xudo farzande intixoʙidast». Pok ast! Benijoz ast! Az oni Ust har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast! Sumoro ʙar on suxan dalele nest. Caro dar ʙorai Xudo cizhoe megued, ki ʙa on ogoh nested
Bigu: «Onho, ki ʙa Xudo duruƣ meʙandand, nacot namejoʙand!»
Barxurdori az dunjo, on goh ʙozgastason ʙa sui Mo. Sipas ʙa cazoi kufr varzidanason azoʙe saxtason mecasonem
